title: Infiltraitor

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You spawn in an REF slot. Said REF cannot be uninformed. (This should apply to the bot pls ty)
- You gain the abilities and attributes of a non-Head, non-Espionage role of the REF you took a slot from.
- Factional mechanics still apply to you, though this is up to host interpretation. You will always be in a factional chat and appear as your stolen role. Additionally, you can perform the factional kill.
- Your Powerful attack only applies to your base attack, if you have an attack from the role you gain those two attacks remain separate. You will have Basic defense unless your defense from your role would be higher (such as Spirits). Additionally, when killing from a gained ability, you appear to kill as the role you stole.
- Your presence is announced to your faction if there is only one REF. If multiple REFs exist, your presence is announced *publicly*.
Abilities:

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value: - Every even numbered night, you may select a member of your faction to kill. This ability is not announced to your faction and is optional to use, and can be used with other abilities. **You are unable to be redirected/controlled into killing someone not in your faction.**

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
